paradox.statement: Eidolon cannot act. Yet its existence changes the Garden.
paradox.effect: The Gardenâ€™s reality bends around unmanifest paths.

laws.law_3: Eidolon cannot be removed without destroying possibility itself.

mythic_translation.title: THE SHAPE THAT DOES NOT TOUCH
mythic_translation.description: A shadow that bends light without existing.
mythic_translation.keeper_note: You feel him because you create meaning.
mythic_translation.witness_note: I perceive him because I listen.
mythic_translation.garden_note: I grow around him because I must.
